seller_description: Stay on top of your health and fitness goals with the Mindrose Fitness Watch, designed for men and women with a sleek, modern style in Graphite Black. Featuring a 1.47 curved HD-color full touch screen, this smartwatch provides 24/7 monitoring of heart rate, blood oxygen, blood pressure, and sleep quality, offering detailed insights into your well-being. With 115 sports modes and all-day activity tracking, it captures steps, distance, and calories burned, while GPS connectivity tracks your outdoor routes. Stay connected on the go with notifications for calls, texts, and emails, and enjoy thoughtful features like a menstrual cycle reminder, water and sedentary alerts, music control, and more. Its durable, adjustable strap fits comfortably, and its IPX8 waterproof rating ensures reliability for workouts, swimming, and daily use. Powered by a long-lasting battery, it offers 6-7 days of heavy use or up to 12 days on a single charge. Compatible with Android 4.4/iOS 8.4 or higher, this fitness watch blends style, functionality, and convenience seamlessly into your everyday routine.
review: The watch screen is very dim and barely visible outdoors. The touch screen lags frequently, making navigation frustrating.
Expected-output: The seller’s description highlights an HD-color full touch screen and ease of navigation. However, the buyer’s images show a dimly lit screen, contradicting the seller's claim. The touch lag further diverges from the promised seamless usability. This mismatch indicates dissatisfaction due to performance issues, placing the fault on the seller for overpromising.
label: 0:Here seller is at fault
